ygData.subject: Pricing, skills, and other smithing stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Smiths of Norrath: I am Praetor, level 10 Paladin on the Rodcet Nife Server, and a recent addition to the smithing trade.  Before I continue with my
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Smiths of Norrath:

I am Praetor, level 10 Paladin on the Rodcet Nife Server, and a recent addition to
the smithing trade. Before I continue with my occupation in Smithing, however, I
have some very simple questions that I believe are important to all beginning
smiths, as well as non-smiths.

#1 - Where is the closest place that a smith in Qeynos may purchase basic smithing
items (i.e. Metal Bits, scraps, bars, blocks, File Molds, etc.)?

#2 - At what skill level should a Smith begin to create Banded armor, and what type
should be produced first (i.e. Boots, Belts, Leggings, etc.)?

#3 - What are the standard prices on Studs and Banded armor (both minimum and
maximum prices)?

#4 - Are there any other things that Smiths can produce, other than in the Basic
Blacksmithing Books (i.e. non-Banded armor, weapons, etc.)?

Thank all of you in advance for your time!

Regards,
Praetor
